body_html:
Thanks for the cuda wheels!

Btw I have Ubuntu 16.04 with anaconda and python 3.6, cuda 9, cudnn 7 and a GPU with compute capability 5.0. I also finished installing the additional MKL-dnn library. However I tried to install the cp36-cp36mu wheel yet it says my platform does not support that wheel. What might be lacking in my system? Thanks in advance!

body:
Thanks for the cuda wheels!

Btw I have Ubuntu 16.04 with anaconda and python 3.6, cuda 9, cudnn 7 and a GPU with compute capability 5.0. I also finished installing the additional MKL-dnn library. However I tried to install the cp36-cp36mu wheel yet it says my platform does not support that wheel. What might be lacking in my system? Thanks in advance!
